name: PenGuns (DanielLloyd)
description:
Game

You are a penguin with a gun. Your job is to defeat the birds who are invading your homeland of Antarctica. With the power of science, your job is to take to the skies and defeat the dreaded birds

Controls

Up arrow / W key - accelerate forward

Left arrow / A key - turn left

Right arrow / D key - turn right

Spacebar key - fire weapon

Abilities

Press shift to boost

Press g to disable gravity

Press f to turn gravity back on

Press h to slow down time

Press q to dodge left

Press e to dodge right

Press z to dodge up

Press c to dodge down

Creators

Chloe Annetts

Monique Gonzales

Daniel Lloyd

Samuel Yeadon

Other Credits
